sentences.en: be a darling and don't mention I'm here.
Come on, darling. I want you.
Darling how lovely to see you, you look simply divine.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的，见到你太让人高兴了，你看上去简直美极了。

sentences.en: Darling Neville, I couldn't be more pleased for you.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的内维尔，我真太为你高兴了。

sentences.en: Darling! It's lovely to see you.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的！见到你真是太好了。

sentences.en: I heard him address her as darling.
sentences.cn: 我听见他称她为“亲爱的”。

sentences.en: I once went camping at Lake Darling with a friend.
sentences.cn: 我曾和一位朋友在达令湖畔露营。

sentences.en: Oat bran became the darling of health freaks last year.
sentences.cn: 燕麦麸在去年成为保健狂人的最爱。

sentences.en: Oh dear, there's the doorbell. See who it is, would you, darling.
sentences.cn: 哦，天哪，门铃响了。看看是谁好吗，亲爱的。

sentences.en: She called him darling. It sounded so forced.
sentences.cn: 她称他为亲爱的。听起来很不自然。

sentences.en: She’s the darling of the fashion world.
What a darling film — everyone adored it.
sentences.cn: 多么令人着迷的一部电影啊——所有人都非常喜欢。

sentences.en: You're very special to me, darling.
sentences.cn: 亲爱的，你对我来说很重要。

trans.tran_en: used of someone you love very much

trans.tran_cn: （用作昵称）亲爱的，宝贝儿，可爱的人，宠儿
trans.tran_en: used when speaking to someone you love
